message.entry: Fail to set Raspberry Pi MATLAB Online settings. Please contact MathWorks technical support to report this error.
Raspberry Pi hardware board not detected. See Set Up Raspberry Pi Hardware for MATLAB Online.
Unable to connect to a Raspberry Pi hardware board. Device status must be ''Ready to connect'' in raspilist output.
Ready to connect
Connected
Upgrade required
Authentication required
Upgrade required
Authentication required
Too many input arguments.
Argument must be a Raspberry Pi name or serial number specified as scalar string or character array. Use raspilist to find available names and serial numbers.
The provided name ''{0}'' matched following Raspberry Pi boards with serial numbers ''{1}''. Specify the serial number to raspi.
Unable to connect to last successfully used Raspberry Pi hardware board. Specify the name or serial number of a Raspberry Pi with device status ''Ready to connect''.
Unable to connect to Raspberry Pi hardware board ({0}). To see list of available devices and statuses, run ''raspilist''.
Unable to connect to Raspberry Pi hardware board ({0}) because device status is ''{1}''. To see list of available devices and statuses, run ''raspilist''.
Failed to connect to IO server on Raspberry Pi hardware board. Try running raspi again.
Unable to execute command ''{0}''. Raspberry Pi hardware board returned the following error message:\n{1}
Executing command as root is not supported.
Command is not supported. Linux commands must be {0}.
Failed to get file from Raspberry Pi hardware board\n{0}
Try running ''getFile'' again.
Destination folder must be under ''/MATLAB Drive''.
Unable to find file ''{0}''.
Failed to log into MATLAB Drive on Raspberry Pi hardware board.
Destination folder does not exist in MATLAB Drive. Create folder then run getFile again.
Failed to receive a response from hardware. File may still be transferring or check network connection on Raspberry Pi.
Unable to get file from Raspberry Pi hardware board due to unrecoverable exception. Please contact Technical Support to report this error.
No permission to delete file ''{0}'' on Raspberry Pi hardware board.
Failed to connect to pubsub server. Please contact Technical Support to report this error.
Internal error - Unknown execute command ''{0}''.
Something unexpected occurred. Run ''clear all'' and then recreate raspi connections if any.
Function is not supported in MATLAB Online. Access Linux command shell on Raspberry Pi hardware board via SSH.
Cannot enable SPI peripheral. Try executing shell command ''sudo matlab-rpi-setup --spi enable'' on Raspberry Pi hardware board.
Failed to receive a response from hardware. Check network connection on Raspberry Pi hardware board.
Failed to read requested number of bytes.
Full file path not supported as input argument. Specify video file name only.
